name: Goblin Revolution (0.8.0)
description:
In battle, every piece can move in three directions: one step diagonal (left or right) or straight forward. In this scene, you have two ways to win: by capturing all the enemy's piece or by reaching the eighth row. Pieces in battle can capture an enemy piece only by a diagonal move.
